description.narrative: Pan American Energy, S.L. is a leading integrated energy company with upstream and downstream operations engaged primarily in the exploration, development and production of crude oil and natural gas, the refining of crude oil and the distribution and marketing of refined products. Pan American Energy, S.L. Argentina Branch (PAE or the Company) is completing a project at its Campana Refinery in Argentina to increase the production of refined products, produce higher value and cleaner burning fuels, and reduce refinery air emissions (the Project). PAE requires financing (i) to for the Companys investment program to finalize the construction and commissioning of the Project and (ii) increased working capital needs.

The Project is expected to (i) create value addition for Argentina by increasing supply of refined products in keeping up with the expected growth in demand, (ii) reduce emissions and lower sulfur dioxide levels, (iii) provide employment opportunities with direct and indirect job creation, and (iv) continue incorporating IFC's EH&S Performance Standards tools to set best practices for the sector.
